scene.name: Lego setup
scene.description: A table with two different colored Lego blocks

task.name: Assemble and disassemble Lego
task.description: Connect two Lego blocks and then separate them
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will play with Lego blocks. The goal is to assemble the blocks and then take them apart.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要进行积木操作。目标是将积木组装起来，然后再拆开。

subtasks.description: Execute the assembly and disassembly sequence
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please assemble the blocks and then disassemble them.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请先把积木拼好，再把它拆开。

steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: pick up the blocks and assemble them together tightly.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：拿起积木，把它们拼在一起并压紧。

steps.description: Disassemble the blocks and return them to the table
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: pull the blocks apart and place them back on the table.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：把积木拆开，并放回桌面上。

constraints.notes: Ensure the blocks are firmly connected in step 1; ensure they are fully separated in step 2.
